summary: Completed comprehensive testing of product categorization feature in CRM system. All three products (LIGA2000, ISTANA2000, PUCUK33) are properly seeded. Product management, database upload with product selection, and filtering functionality work correctly for both admin and staff roles.

resolved_issues.issue: Database model validation errors for legacy data
resolved_issues.fix: Made product_id and product_name optional in Database model for backward compatibility
resolved_issues.impact: Fixed 500 errors when listing databases with legacy data

resolved_issues.issue: File upload endpoint not accepting Form parameters
resolved_issues.fix: Updated upload endpoint to use Form(...) for product_id parameter
resolved_issues.impact: Database uploads now work correctly with product selection

passed_tests: Product seeding verification - all 3 products exist (LIGA2000, ISTANA2000, PUCUK33)
Admin: Delete product protection (fails when has databases)
Admin: Upload database with product selection
Staff: View databases with product badges
Product dropdown shows all products in upload form
End-to-end: Product filtering works correctly for both admin and staff
Role-based access control (staff cannot access admin features)
Database listing shows product name badges
Backend API endpoints (34/34 tests passed - 100% success rate)
